mapper.select: SELECT u.address,u.createTime,u.headImgUrl,u.hobby,u.occupation ,u.phone,u.qQNum,u.realName,u.weiXinNum,u.userType,u.birthday,u.sex ,u.height,u.hotcount,u.videourl,u.record,u.bloodtype,u.wage,u.selectcondition ,u.signcontent,u.married ,ui.* ,iu.realName uirealname FROM userintroduces ui LEFT JOIN users u ON ui.uIUserID=u.userID LEFT JOIN users iu ON ui.userID=iu.userID where iu.userid is not null and ui.uiuserid=#{uiuserid} Limit 0,1
mapper.delete: delete from userintroduces where uiuserid=#{uiuserid} and userid=#{userid}
